title: Is We Dumb? | Rectum. Silver Medal. Taxi. Puppy Kick.
description:
Always remember, if your friend tells you to shove an eel up your ass to cure constipation... just don't. Let's talk about that, drunk idiots in comedy clubs, an amazing olympian who is trying to save a child's life, every ant in the world wanting to murder you, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/fODOnnjOiNQ
